scopes.openid: Grants access to fields required by OpenID

ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
ApiKeyAuth.description: Workaround for lack of OIDC support. Use "Bearer id_token_goes_here" as the value.

info.title: Management Layer API
info.description:
The Management Layer API exposes the functionality that is available to users. Access to this API is based on a user token that must be presented with every request.

The Management Layer ties together the User Data Store, Access Control System and Authentication Service. It performs permission checking and audit logging.

optional_limit.description: An optional query parameter to limit the number of results returned.
optional_limit.name: limit

optional_offset.description: An optional query parameter specifying the offset in the result set to start from.
optional_offset.name: offset

optional_domain_filter.description: An optional query parameter to filter by domain_id
optional_domain_filter.name: domain_id

optional_invitation_filter.description: An optional query parameter to filter by invitation_id
optional_invitation_filter.name: invitation_id

optional_role_filter.description: An optional query parameter to filter by role_id
optional_role_filter.name: role_id

optional_user_filter.description: An optional query parameter to filter by user_id
optional_user_filter.name: user_id

domain_id.description: A unique integer value identifying the domain.
domain_id.name: domain_id

invitation_id.description: A UUID value identifying the invitation.
invitation_id.name: invitation_id

permission_id.description: A unique integer value identifying the permission.
permission_id.name: permission_id

resource_id.description: A unique integer value identifying the resource.
resource_id.name: resource_id

role_id.description: A unique integer value identifying the role.
role_id.name: role_id

site_id.description: A unique integer value identifying the site.
site_id.name: site_id

user_id.description: A UUID value identifying the user.
user_id.name: user_id

optional_site_filter.description: An optional query parameter to filter by site_id
optional_site_filter.name: site_id

admin_note_id.description: A unique integer value identifying the admin note.
admin_note_id.name: admin_note_id

country_code.description: A unique two-character value identifying the country.
country_code.name: country_code

client_id.description: A string value identifying the client
client_id.name: client_id

invitor_id.description: The user that created the invitation
The user that created the invitation

site_role_labels_aggregated.description: An object containing a site ID and an aggregated list of all the role labels supported by the site and all the domains in its lineage.

user_site_role_labels_aggregated.description: An object containing a user ID, site ID and an aggregated list of all the role labels assigned to the user for the site and all the domains in its lineage.

domain_roles.description: An object containing the domain roles defined for a given domain and its lineage.

domain_id.description: The domain for which the request was made.

roles_map.description: A dictionary where the keys are domain ids prefixed with `d:` and the values are lists of role ids.

additionalProperties.description: The list of role ids for the domain

site_and_domain_roles.description: An object containing the site- and domain lineage roles defined for a given site.

site_id.description: The site for which the request was made.

roles_map.description: A dictionary where the keys are site and domain ids prefixed with `s:` and `d:`, respectively and the values are lists of role ids.

additionalProperties.description: The list of role ids for the site or domain

all_user_roles.description: An object containing the effective roles that a user has in any place in the organisational tree.

creator_id.description: The user making the request will be considered the creator and thus this field is not available when creating admin note.
The user making the request will be considered the creator and thus this field is not available when creating admin note.

_post_logout_redirect_uris.description: New-line delimited list of post-logout redirect URIs

_redirect_uris.description: New-line delimited list of redirect URIs

require_consent.description: If disabled, the Server will NEVER ask the user for consent.

reuse_consent.description: If enabled, the Server will save the user consent given to a specific client, so that user will not be prompted for the same authorization multiple times.

terms_url.description: External reference to the privacy policy of the client.

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.

is_active.description: Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Deselect this instead of deleting accounts.
Designates whether this user should be treated as active. Deselect this instead of deleting accounts.

get.description: Get a list of all possible role labels that a user can have from the specified sites perspective.
Get a list of all role labels that the specified user has from the specified sites perspective.
Get the domain and its lineages roles defined for a domain.
Get the site- and domain lineage roles defined for a given site.
Get the effective roles that a user has at any place in the organisational tree.

get.description: Activate the site so that users can log in to it.
